objections.response: I understand budget is important. Let me show you the value you're getting: {product_features}. We also have a {discount_name} available right now!
Of course, take your time! Just so you know, {urgency_reason}. Can I answer any specific questions that might help with your decision?
Thanks for letting me know! What we offer differently is {differentiator}. Would you like me to break down what's included?
